name: Middle Earth HR
description: Middle Earth HR was started 25 years ago in Dec 1996 . Over the first few years Middle Earth HR started as a general Hr services company which slowly evolved to focus on HR, L&D and leadership certification programs by 2007. Since then Middle Earth HR grew in leaps and bounds to become Asia and Africa's leading L&D organization focusing on supporting these communities with practical, high quality and value for money certifications. Middle earth is built on providing our learners with targeted learning journeys which create a wow experience with a highly supportive environment. Today we offer more than 40 certifications which allow working professionals belonging to the HR, L&D and leadership community to build credible learning journeys to grow careers, build best practice based system in their organizations and learn cutting edge training subjects. Middle earth offers 6 distinct types of certifications.

enhanced_description: Middle Earth HR, launched in December 1996, initially offered general HR services and evolved by 2007 to specialize in HR, L&D, and leadership certification programs. Recognized as Asia and Africa's leading L&D organization and the world's 7th largest practical HR training company, MEHR provides over 40 certifications. These certifications are designed to offer practical, high-quality, and value-for-money learning journeys for working professionals in HR, L&D, and leadership, enabling them to advance careers, implement best practices, and learn cutting-edge subjects across topics such as talent management, analytics, and coaching. The programs are delivered through a comprehensive blended format including e-learning, outbound training, classroom sessions, Virtual Instructor-Led Training (VILT), and coaching, with live Zoom classes and other online options. Middle Earth HR emphasizes verifiable impact and the transfer of learning to the workplace, supported by its own studio for e-learning content development.
